details.title: 28 Days Later
details.summary: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
details.tagline: His fear began when he woke up alone. His terror began when he realised he wasn't.
details.subject: Zombie

cast.starring: Alex Palmer, Bindu De Stoppani, Jukka Hiltunen

details.title: American Psycho
details.summary: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.
details.tagline: Killer looks. ; Killer inside.
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Christian Bale, Reese Witherspoon, Jared Leto

details.title: SAW
details.summary: Would you kill to live? When a madman tries to teach how much life is worth, two men find themselves in a room with no idea how they got there or why they're there.
details.tagline: Live or die. Make your choice
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Cary Elwes, Leigh Whannell, Danny Glover

details.title: The Silence of the Lambs
details.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.
details.tagline: To enter the mind of a killer she must challenge the mind of a madman.
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn

details.title: Se7en
details.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
details.tagline: Seven deadly sins. Seven ways to die.
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey

details.title: Scream
details.summary: Attempting to cope with her mother's murder, Sydney and her horror movie-obsessed friends are stalked by a murderer who seems to have a hard time letting the past go.
details.tagline: Don't Answer The Phone. Don't Open The Door. Don't Try To Escape.
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, Drew Barrymore

details.title: The Evil Dead
details.summary: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.
details.tagline: They got up on the wrong side of the grave.
details.subject: Demonic Possession

cast.starring: Bruce Campbell, Ellen Sandweiss, Richard DeManincor

details.title: The Hills Have Eyes
details.summary: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.
details.tagline: The lucky ones die first.
details.subject: Stranded

cast.starring: Aaron Stanford, Kathleen Quinlan, Vinessa Shaw

details.title: The Collector
details.summary: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.
details.tagline: He always takes one.
details.subject: Serial Killer

details.title: Halloween
details.summary: On Halloween night of 1963, 6-year old Michael Myers stabbed his sister to death. After sitting in a mental hospital for 15 years, Myers escapes and returns to Haddonfield to kill.
details.tagline: The Night HE Came Home!
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Nancy Kyes

details.title: The Exorcist
details.summary: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.
details.tagline: The Devil Inside
details.subject: Possession

details.title: Child's Play
details.summary: A single mother gives her son a much sought after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.
details.tagline: Something's moved in with the Barclay family, and so has terror.
details.subject: Serial Killer

cast.starring: Catherine Hicks, Chris Sarandon, Brad Dourif

details.title: Friday the 13th
details.summary: A group of camp counselors is stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.
details.tagline: They were warned...They are doomed...And on Friday the 13th, nothing will save them.
details.subject: Supernatural Serial Killer

cast.starring: Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Kevin Bacon

details.title: Children of the Corn
details.summary: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.
details.tagline: An adult nightmare.
details.subject: Stranded

movie_name.cast: Fritz Kiersch Peter Horton, John Franklin, Courtney Gains

details.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
details.summary: Several people are hunted by a cruel serial killer who kills his victims in their dreams. When the survivors are trying to find the reason for being chosen, the murderer won't lose any chance to kill them as soon as they fall asleep.
details.tagline: If Nancy doesn't wake up screaming she won't wake up at all
details.subject: Supernatural Serial Killer

movie_name.cast: Wes Craven Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Johnny Depp

details.title: Insidious
details.summary: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
details.tagline: It's not the House that's Haunted.
details.subject: Possession

movie_name.cast: James Wan Patrick Wilson, Rose Bryne, Ty Simpkins

details.title: The Blair Witch Project
details.summary: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.
details.tagline: The scariest movie of all time is a true story.
details.subject: Documentary

movie_name.cast: Eduardo Sanchez Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams

details.title: The Omen
details.summary: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the anti-christ? The devil's own son?
details.tagline: You Have Been Warned. If Something Frightening Happens To You Today. Think About It. It May Be "The Omen."
details.subject: Antichrist

movie_name.cast: Richard Donner Harvey Stephens, Gregory Peck, Lee Remick

details.title: The Shining
details.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
details.tagline: The Horror is driving him crazy
details.subject: Haunted Hotel

movie_name.cast: Stanley Kubrick Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

details.title: Psycho
details.summary: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
details.tagline: A new- and altogether different- screen excitement!!!
details.subject: Serial Killer

movie_name.cast: Alfred Hitchcock Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles, John Gavin
